Media Queries Are Important

CSS3 media queries can help sites perform better in Google search results and the W3C officially recommends them as a web standard. Read post »

TUTORIAL: Remove Files From GitHub

Learn how to remove files from GitHub, how GitHub works with Git to manage repos, and some UNIX commands. Learning resource list at the end. Read post »

REVIEW: Eloquent JavaScript

Great JavaScript book for beginners covering the fundamentals in detail, focusing on how to use them in web applications, not just websites. Read post »

SCREENCAST TUTORIAL: Using JavaScript Off-DOM

How to create/change page elements off-DOM with JavaScript. Discusses createDocumentFragment, cloneNode, appendChild, jQuery .attr() & more. Read post »

The kaidez JavaScript Conference Tour: Leg 1: Fluent 2012/San Francisco

Kai discusses what courses and sessions he'll be checking out at the 2012 Fluent JavaScript Conference. Node, and Jasmine are a few of them. Read post »

ABOUT ME

I'm a web developer for Revlon. I like to "over-communicate" in my tutorials so beginners can better understand the topics being discussed.
